name: SimpleArithmeticCalculator-Mathguy
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math guy
des:
Open it by saying "Alexa, Open math guy"

You can use common arithmetic keywords like
 • add, plus - addition
 • subtract, minus - subtraction
 • multiply, times - multiplication
 • divide, by - division

Two number computation
--------------------------------
addition - 4 plus 3
subtraction - 4 minus 3
multiplication - 4 times 3
division - 4 by 3

Continuous computation
----------------------------
addition - plus 4
subtraction - minus 4
multiplication - times 4
division - by 4

- Say numbers one after other, skill will tell the total.
- You can add as many numbers as you want.
- Say "Reset" or "Restart" to start adding from 0 again, or to start new series.
- Say "Stop" or "Cancel" to stop skill.
- Say "Help" for listing common keywords
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
